name: Free the prisoner
description:
This project was made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2021.

The idea was to make a casual game with the jam's topic "Free" in mind.
Your goal is to free your friend who keeps getting locked-up by shooting the lock.

Control your character's aim with the mouse and shoot with the left mouse button.
Press P for pause menu.
Game was not intended for mobile, but it works :)
